name: Honor Magic V6
highlights:
Exp. release 2026, March
219g or 224g, 4mm thickness
Android 16, up to 7 major upgrades
512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Dimensions:
Unfolded: 156.7 x 145.6 x 4.0 mm or 4.1 mm
Folded: 156.7 x 74.5 x 8.8 mm or 9.0 mm
BODY.SIM:
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM
BODY:
IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
Stylus support (both displays)

DISPLAY.Type: Foldable LTPO2 AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, 4320Hz PWM, 5000 nits (peak)
DISPLAY:
Anti-reflective coating
Cover display:
LTPO2 OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, 4320Hz PWM, 6000 nits (peak)
6.52 inches, 1080 x 2420 pixels, 406 ppi, Honor Anti-scratch NanoCrystal Shield
Anti-reflective coating

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 7 major Android upgrades, MagicOS 10
PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.6, 23mm (wide), 1/1.56", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS
64 MP, f/2.5, 70mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.0", 0.7µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 122˚ (ultrawide), AF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, LED flash, HDR, panorama

SELFIE CAMERA.Single:
20 MP, f/2.2, (wide)
Cover camera:
20 MP, f/2.2, (wide)

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer

BATTERY.Charging:
80W wired
66W wireless
Reverse wireless
5W reverse wired
